message: I didn't see the Volta pitch, heard it was good.
Volta, Hipmunk and Chute convinced me eventually as I must say I do have so many photos on my iPhone I haven't even synced and want to upload in bulk.
Hipmunk app is very nice. Investors liked Volta.

GreenGoose for LaunchPad companies, Volta/Cabana for 1.0 companies, Careers/Stackoverflow for 2.0 (slightly over hipmunk b/c hipmunk felt like mobile version of already awesome product, whereas Careers2.0 felt like a new product build off the IP and value of the current StackOverflow products)
green goose but i did some research last night......some of what they indicated was vaporware as it stands today.
I know the guys from Top Ten...and they are pretty awesome. I think their new stuff has some real potential.
